verses.verse: And the LORD <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

Send <WH7971> thou men <WH582>, that they may search <WH8446> the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667>, which I give <WH5414> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>: of every <WH376> tribe <WH4294> of their fathers <WH1> shall ye send <WH7971> a man <WH259>, every one a ruler <WH5387> among them.

And Moses <WH4872> by the commandment <WH6310> of the LORD <WH3068> sent <WH7971> them from the wilderness <WH4057> of Paran <WH6290>: all those men <WH582> were <WH1992> heads <WH7218> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>.
And these were their names <WH8034>: of the tribe <WH4294> of Reuben <WH7205>, Shammua <WH8051> the son <WH1121> of Zaccur <WH2139>.
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Simeon <WH8095>, Shaphat <WH8202> the son <WH1121> of Hori <WH2753>.
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Judah <WH3063>, Caleb <WH3612> the son <WH1121> of Jephunneh <WH3312>.
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Issachar <WH3485>, Igal <WH3008> the son <WH1121> of Joseph <WH3130>.
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Ephraim <WH669>, Oshea <WH1954> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126>.
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Benjamin <WH1144>, Palti <WH6406> the son <WH1121> of Raphu <WH7505>.
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Zebulun <WH2074>, Gaddiel <WH1427> the son <WH1121> of Sodi <WH5476>.
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Joseph <WH3130>, namely, of the tribe <WH4294> of Manasseh <WH4519>, Gaddi <WH1426> the son <WH1121> of Susi <WH5485>.
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Dan <WH1835>, Ammiel <WH5988> the son <WH1121> of Gemalli <WH1582>.
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Asher <WH836>, Sethur <WH5639> the son <WH1121> of Michael <WH4317>.
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Naphtali <WH5321>, Nahbi <WH5147> the son <WH1121> of Vophsi <WH2058>.
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Gad <WH1410>, Geuel <WH1345> the son <WH1121> of Machi <WH4352>.

These are the names <WH8034> of the men <WH582> which Moses <WH4872> sent <WH7971> to spy out <WH8446> the land <WH776>. And Moses <WH4872> called <WH7121> Oshea <WH1954> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126> Jehoshua <WH3091>.

And Moses <WH4872> sent <WH7971> them to spy out <WH8446> the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667>, and said <WH559> unto them, Get you up <WH5927> this way southward <WH5045>, and go up <WH5927> into the mountain <WH2022>:
And see <WH7200> the land <WH776>, what it is; and the people <WH5971> that dwelleth <WH3427> therein, whether they be strong <WH2389> or weak <WH7504>, few <WH4592> or many <WH7227>;

And what the land <WH776> is that they dwell in <WH3427>, whether it be good <WH2896> or bad <WH7451>; and what cities <WH5892> they be that they dwell <WH3427> in <WH2007>, whether in tents <WH4264>, or in strong holds <WH4013>;

And what the land <WH776> is, whether it be fat <WH8082> or lean <WH7330>, whether there be <WH3426> wood <WH6086> therein, or not. And be ye of good courage <WH2388>, and bring <WH3947> of the fruit <WH6529> of the land <WH776>. Now the time <WH3117> was the time <WH3117> of the firstripe <WH1061> grapes <WH6025>.
So they went up <WH5927>, and searched <WH8446> the land <WH776> from the wilderness <WH4057> of Zin <WH6790> unto Rehob <WH7340>, as men come <WH935> to Hamath <WH2574>.

And they ascended <WH5927> by the south <WH5045>, and came <WH935> unto Hebron <WH2275>; where Ahiman <WH289>, Sheshai <WH8344>, and Talmai <WH8526>, the children <WH3211> of Anak <WH6061>, were. (Now Hebron <WH2275> was built <WH1129> seven <WH7651> years <WH8141> before <WH6440> Zoan <WH6814> in Egypt <WH4714>.)

And they came <WH935> unto the brook <WH5158> of Eshcol <WH812>, and cut down <WH3772> from thence a branch <WH2156> with one <WH259> cluster <WH811> of grapes <WH6025>, and they bare <WH5375> it between two <WH8147> upon a staff <WH4132>; and they brought of the pomegranates <WH7416>, and of the figs <WH8384>. brook: or, valley

The place <WH4725> was called <WH7121> the brook <WH5158> Eshcol <WH812>, because of <WH182> the cluster of grapes <WH811> which the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> cut down <WH3772> from thence. brook: or, valley Eshcol: that is, A cluster of grapes
And they returned <WH7725> from searching <WH8446> of the land <WH776> after <WH7093> forty <WH705> days <WH3117>.

And they went <WH3212> and came <WH935> to Moses <WH4872>, and to Aaron <WH175>, and to all the congregation <WH5712> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, unto the wilderness <WH4057> of Paran <WH6290>, to Kadesh <WH6946>; and brought back <WH7725> word <WH1697> unto them, and unto all the congregation <WH5712>, and shewed <WH7200> them the fruit <WH6529> of the land <WH776>.

And they told <WH5608> him, and said <WH559>, We came <WH935> unto the land <WH776> whither thou sentest <WH7971> us, and surely it floweth <WH2100> with milk <WH2461> and honey <WH1706>; and this is the fruit <WH6529> of it.

Nevertheless <WH657> the people <WH5971> be strong <WH5794> that dwell <WH3427> in the land <WH776>, and the cities <WH5892> are walled <WH1219>, and very <WH3966> great <WH1419>: and moreover we saw <WH7200> the children <WH3211> of Anak <WH6061> there.

The Amalekites <WH6002> dwell <WH3427> in the land <WH776> of the south <WH5045>: and the Hittites <WH2850>, and the Jebusites <WH2983>, and the Amorites <WH567>, dwell <WH3427> in the mountains <WH2022>: and the Canaanites <WH3669> dwell <WH3427> by the sea <WH3220>, and by the coast <WH3027> of Jordan <WH3383>.

And Caleb <WH3612> stilled <WH2013> the people <WH5971> before Moses <WH4872>, and said <WH559>, Let us go up <WH5927> at once <WH5927>, and possess <WH3423> it; for we are well able <WH3201> to overcome <WH3201> it.
But the men <WH582> that went up <WH5927> with him said <WH559>, We be not able <WH3201> to go up <WH5927> against the people <WH5971>; for they are stronger <WH2389> than we.

And they brought up <WH3318> an evil report <WH1681> of the land <WH776> which they had searched <WH8446> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, saying <WH559>, The land <WH776>, through which we have gone <WH5674> to search <WH8446> it, is a land <WH776> that eateth up <WH398> the inhabitants <WH3427> thereof; and all the people <WH5971> that we saw <WH7200> in it <WH8432> are men <WH582> of a great stature <WH4060>. men: Heb. men of statures

And there we saw <WH7200> the giants <WH5303>, the sons <WH1121> of Anak <WH6061>, which come of the giants <WH5303>: and we were in our own sight <WH5869> as grasshoppers <WH2284>, and so we were in their sight <WH5869>.
